sentence.Network_cn: 农民脱下了他们的帽子。

sentence.Network_en: Doff your stupid habits and live.
sentence.Network_cn: 抛弃你的坏习惯好好生活吧.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: contraction of do off. Compare with don

entry.def: If you doff your hat or coat, you take it off.

example.tran: 农民脱下了他们的帽子。

auth_sentence.content: I will doff my travelling cap and on with the monk's cowl.
auth_sentence.res_content: I will doff my travelling cap and on with the monk's cowl.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I will doff my travelling cap and on with the monk's cowl.

auth_sentence.content: Tina Fey makes me want to wear a massive tricorn hat so I can ostentatiously doff it to her, should I ever meet her.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tina Fey makes me want to wear a massive tricorn hat so I can ostentatiously doff it to her, should I ever meet her.

auth_sentence.content: And hard-core techies will also doff their caps at an operating system which is Apple's first to be truly 64-bit.

sentences.en: She doffs her garb worn under fire and wears again female attire.
sentences.cn: 脱我战时袍着我旧时裳。
